price: Warra lolaman sababa miidhamuu isaaniitiif (loluun) hayyamni godhameef, dhugumatti Rabbiin isaaniif tumsuu irratti danda’aadha.
arabic: أُذِنَ لِلَّذِينَ يُقَٰتَلُونَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ ظُلِمُواْۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ نَصۡرِهِمۡ لَقَدِيرٌ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: udhina lilladhīna yuqātalūna bi-annahum ẓulimū wa-inna al-laha ʿalā naṣrihim laqadīrun
